title: Volodymyr Zelenskyy – 2022 Statement on the Situation in Ukraine (11/10/2022)
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Volodymyr Zelenskyy, the President of Ukraine, on 11 October 2022.

Chernihiv region, Sumy region, Kyiv and Kyiv region, Lviv region, Ternopil region, Dnipropetrovsk region – we are working.
